questions.question: You are invited to a friend's birthday. You respond thanking him/her. Suggest some different ways that you can help him/her.

answers.answer: It's a pleasure for me to come to your birthay. I wish it'll be the most successfull party the world has ever known. I'd like to help to prepare this event. In fact, I can come earlier in the day and I have some ideas which are going to delight you. Do you agree ? Do you remember my birthay ? I invited some rakish singers for the night and I'm still in contact with them I assure you that if you want them to come. They'll sing for you for free.
I'm looking forward to hearing about you.
